document_data.name: Green Lady's Keep
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Green Lady's Keep
document_data.organizations: Organizations in the Green Lady's Keep
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Lady's Keep''' was a long, low temple to [[Chauntea]] in [[Velprintalar]], [[Aglarond]].
document_data.History:
In [[1368 DR]], the abbey included a granary where twelve monks were led by Abbot [[Dalmar]].In the 2nd edition sourcebook ''[[Spellbound]]'', Dalmar is stated as being an abbot of a temple to Chauntea that specializes in brewing ale. Later in the 3rd edition [[Unapproachable East (sourcebook)|''Unapproachable East'' sourcebook]], the abbey is called the "Green Lady's Keep".

By [[1374 DR]], the monks had increased in number to over one hundred.
document_data.Inhabitants: The monks worked to produce a green ale said to include fermented [[wikipedia:parsley|parsley]], which was one of the city's most popular exports.
